alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 12:27PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong wind and light snow overnight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...West to southwest winds of 30 to 40 mph gusting as high as 50 to 60 mph. Light snow will also occur with high elevation accumulations around 1 to 4 inches. Snowfall accumulations along South Pass will be less than 1 inch. * WHERE...East slopes of the Wind River Mountains, including South Pass and Red Canyon. * WHEN...Strongest winds will occur between 11 PM Tonight through 5 AM Thursday. Snow will fall between 5 AM and Noon Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of localized reduced visibility is possible early Thursday morning over South Pass due to falling light snow and strong winds. A blow over risk exists across South Pass for light and/or high profile vehicles.
